snippet: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway said quarterly profit doubled to a record, reflecting a large gain on its stake in Kraft Heinz, while operating profit declined.
abstract: Warren E Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway reports third-quarter profit rose to $9.43 billion, or $5,737 per Class A share, from $4.62 billion, or $2,811, in year-ago quarter.
lead_paragraph: Warren E. Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway said quarterly profit doubled to a record, reflecting a large gain on its stake in Kraft Heinz, while operating profit declined.

headline.main: Berkshire Hathaway Posts Record $9.43. Billion Profit
headline.print_headline: Berkshire Hathaway Posts Record $9.43. Billion Profit
